sql.statement:
SELECT PROGRAM_ID , CUSTOMER_ID , CUSTOMER_NAME , TEMPLATE_ID , TEMPLATE_NAME , ISSUE_YEAR , BRANCH_CODE , BRANCH_NAME , PROGRAM_TYPE , PROGRAM_STATUS , START_MO , START_YEAR , END_MO , END_YEAR , VERTICAL_ID , VERTICAL_NAME , YPCONNECT_IND , LEVER_IND , MPD_CNT , REP_ID , REP_NAME , MGR_ID , MGR_NAME , MC2_MGR_ID , MC2_MGR_NAME , CHANNEL_CODE , CALL_LEAD_OBJ , NONCALL_LEAD_OBJ , PRD_CALL_LEAD_PCT , PRD_NONCALL_LEAD_PCT , UNMEAS_CALL_LEADS , UNMEAS_NONCALL_LEADS , TOT_CALL_LEAD , TOT_CALL_LEAD_PCT , TOT_CALL_LEAD_TRD , TOT_NONCALL_LEAD , TOT_NONCALL_LEAD_PCT , TOT_NONCALL_LEAD_TRD , TOT_CTN_EVERY_CALLS , TOT_YPCONNECT_CALLS , TOT_CALLS_DELIVERED , TOT_CLICKS_WEBSITE , TOT_PRINT_DIRECTIONS , TOT_PRINT_LANDING_PG , TOT_EMAILS_SUBMITTED , TOT_VIDEO_VIEWS , TOT_BOOK_MARKS , TOT_FORM_FILLS , PRV_CALL_LEAD , PRV_CALL_LEAD_PCT , PRV_CALL_LEAD_TRD ,PRV_NONCALL_LEAD ,PRV_NONCALL_LEAD_PCT ,PRV_NONCALL_LEAD_TRD ,PRV_CTN_EVERY_CALLS ,PRV_YPCONNECT_CALLS ,PRV_CALLS_DELIVERED ,PRV_CLICKS_WEBSITE ,PRV_PRINT_DIRECTIONS ,PRV_PRINT_LANDING_PG ,PRV_EMAILS_SUBMITTED ,PRV_VIDEO_VIEWS ,PRV_BOOK_MARKS ,PRV_FORM_FILLS ,CONTACT_NAME ,CONTACT_ADDRESS ,CONTACT_PHONE ,CONTACT_EMAIL ,PROGRAM_NISD ,CUSTOMER_NISD ,CONTRACT_QUERY_IND ,ITEM_QUERY_IND ,LOAD_DATE ,LOAD_NUMBER
FROM TEST_MC2_PGM_SMY_CA A WHERE ( 'ALL' = {mc2Branch} or A.BRANCH_CODE = {mc2Branch} )
